        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>promethean</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Sound Review</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">How does sound travel and what parts of the ear detect sound best? Using multiple websites, students discover animals that make the loudest sounds, which tapped glass will create the highest pitch, what an echo is, and what ear parts really matter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">echo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">decibels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Science</string>
          </keyword>
